errors.name: NotMasterAuthority
errors.msg: Signer is not the master authority

errors.msg: Signer is not authorized to mint

errors.msg: Transfer hook not registered on this stablecoin

errors.name: AccountNotFrozen
errors.msg: Cannot seize from a non-frozen account

errors.name: NotPendingAuthority
errors.msg: Signer is not the pending authority

errors.name: ZeroAmount
errors.msg: Amount must be greater than zero
